class.name: ch.algotrader.entity.trade.OrderStatusImpl
class.meta: Represents Order {@link ch.algotrader.enumeration.Status Status} changes received from the Broker (i.e. PARTIALLY_EXECUTED or CANCELLED)
class.comment: Represents Order {@link ch.algotrader.enumeration.Status Status} changes received from the Broker (i.e. PARTIALLY_EXECUTED or CANCELLED)

property.name: dateTime
property.meta: The {@code dateTime} the Fill was received by the system.

column.name: DATE_TIME
column.comment: The {@code dateTime} the Fill was received by the system.

property.name: extDateTime
property.meta: The external {@code dateTime} of the Fill as assigned by the external Broker.

column.name: EXT_DATE_TIME
column.comment: The external {@code dateTime} of the Fill as assigned by the external Broker.

property.name: filledQuantity
property.meta: The quantity of the Order that has already been filled.

column.name: FILLED_QUANTITY
column.comment: The quantity of the Order that has already been filled.

property.name: remainingQuantity
property.meta: The remaining quantity of the Order that has not been filled yet.

column.name: REMAINING_QUANTITY
column.comment: The remaining quantity of the Order that has not been filled yet.

property.name: avgPrice
property.meta: The volume weighted average price of all associated transactions.

column.name: AVG_PRICE
column.comment: The volume weighted average price of all associated transactions.

property.name: lastPrice
property.meta: The execution price of the last fill

column.name: LAST_PRICE
column.comment: The execution price of the last fill

property.name: intId
property.meta: The internal Id of the Order.

column.name: INT_ID
column.comment: The internal Id of the Order.

property.name: extId
property.meta: The external Id of the Order

column.name: EXT_ID
column.comment: The external Id of the Order

property.name: sequenceNumber
property.meta: the sequence number of the corresponding broker specific message (e.g. fix sequence number)

column.name: SEQUENCE_NUMBER
column.comment: the sequence number of the corresponding broker specific message (e.g. fix sequence number)

many-to-one.name: order
many-to-one.meta: Base Class for all Order Types

column.name: ORDER_FK
column.comment: Base Class for all Order Types
